name: dronedeploy-oam
description: OAM export application for the DroneDeploy marketplace
author: Sean Harkins

scripts.build: yarn run bundle:css & NODE_ENV=production browserify src/app.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] -g localenvify -g uglifyify -o static/bundle.js
scripts.watch: npm run bundle:css & npm run watch:bundle
scripts.watch:bundle: NODE_ENV=development watchify src/app.js -v -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] -d -g [ localenvify --envfile .env.dev ] -o static/bundle.js
